placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
context: Use in context of: Откройте для себя Тайланд осенью — экзотика и низкие цены!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, featuring a stunning beach scene with palm trees and a sunset, evoking feelings of relaxation and adventure.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
